headline.main: LONDON GOSSIP.; The Queen wants to go "Shopping"--Know-Nothingism in the London Muscial World--Opera and the Drama--The Palmerston Bottle-Holder--Punch's Motto on the Maine Law--Crimean Nick-Names.

docs.lead_paragraph: [Advetisement.] ORYSTAL PALACE.--WASHINGTONEA GIGANTEA, FOR MONSTER TREE OF CALIFORNIA !--An enormous, specimen of the Forest Giants of California, transcending in size and beauty any "big tree" as yet imported from that region, has just arrived from San Francisco, and will be exhibited in the Crystal Palace, which has been engaged by the proprietor of this wonder of nature, as the only building in New-York large enough to display its magnificent proportions.

headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; A Novel Display of Talent--How to Sell Old Clothes. How Got the Duy was: Grammar School Exhibition. The Governor's Visit to the Public Institutions, Second Day--The Quarantine. RAPE AND ROBBERY. Police. The Board of Police Commissioners--Lion's Case. Charge against Mr. Echeiveira of fitting out a Slaver. U. S. COMMISSIONER'S OFFICE.

docs.lead_paragraph: Among the jolly workers that make up the TIMES' corps is one who is suspected of being a Salamander in human shape. At least he is never comfortably warm unless he is uncomfortably hot. Yesterday, taking an overcoat on has arin, he sallied forth, in the heat of the day, bound to discover whether or not it were so hot as everybody reported it.

docs.lead_paragraph: Fire in Brooklyn. Between 12 and 1 o'clock yesterday morning a fire broke out in a stable on Bugbie's Alley, leading from Fulton between Henry and Hicks streets, owned and occupied by HENRY RADFORD, furniture dealer, which was entirely consumed, together with its contents, consisting of one horse, carriages, harness.

headline.main: HAVANA.; The Steamer St. Lawrence on the Florida Reef--Ghosts--Disbanding of the Black Troops.

docs.lead_paragraph: I gave you notes on the 20th inst., per steamer St. Lawrence, which we are advised of as being upon the Florida Reef, not far from Key West. Part of her cargo had been thrown over without relief, and she had on board some eighty or ninety passengers.
docs.snippet: I gave you notes on the 20th inst., per steamer St. Lawrence, which we are advised of as being upon the Florida Reef, not far from Key West. Part of her cargo had been thrown over without relief, and she had on board some eighty or ninety passengers.

headline.main: The Governor's Visit to the Public Institutions.

docs.lead_paragraph: Governor CLARK paid a visit to the public Institutions on Randall's Island, Ward's Island, and Blackwell's Island yesterday. He was accompanied by about thirty gentlemen of prominence in State and City affairs, among whom were the Lieut. vernor, Hon. C. C. LEIGH, Aldermen
